document.full_text: grass fires spread by gusting winds swept through parts of oklahoma on friday, prompting authorities to dispatch helicopters, bulldozers and hundreds of firefighters to control the blazes.
document.title: at least two dozen grass fires burn in oklahoma
lines_and_colors: grass fires spread by gusting winds swept through parts of oklahoma on friday, prompting authorities to dispatch helicopters, bulldozers and hundreds of firefighters to control the blazes.
